今天主要是思考练习方向。目前起笔存在问题的，方起笔后中锋会不太到位，导致侧锋行笔，笔画虚。
对于我来说，没有悟到起笔调锋那个提按的点，似是而非的感觉。现在的方起笔比最开始练的时候看起来好多了，但确实还不够。
考虑了一下是换成方起笔特别多的张迁碑，或者是继续宋武帝。
所以试了一下隶书的蝉头燕尾，发现那个燕尾也是大难题，方起笔➕燕尾⊙▽⊙难上加难

继续找笔势的起笔感jio      O_o保持耐心 静心 平常心，一定能学会的，加油
——————————————————
笔势笔记：
“形”导致“势”。
有了“势”，字就灵气飞动。没有“势”，字就板滞僵硬。
在熟练掌握各种点画的书写基础上，将点画当做一个有机整体，上一笔的“收笔”就是下一笔的“逆锋起笔”。
承上启下，环环相扣，循环往复，自然意气连贯，顾盼生情，神气活现。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230205/2023020508101761579814.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230205/2023020508101725717214.jpg","idx":1},{"width":4000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230205/2023020508101748017499.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第126天\n找起笔的感脚，先写了2张，感觉起笔很糟糕，还是一个字一个字的磨顺畅叭\n（抚脑壳，摊椅子上）","hasMore":false}

第一张写的磕磕绊绊，丑不拉几，节凑不太好，不过似乎摸到点感觉。。。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221129/2022112910524046651109.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221129/2022112910563531341399.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第99天
今天的字毛毛躁躁。
慢慢理解“形”与“势”，写不出来那种意气连贯的感觉，那就先完成“形”吧，第一遍峄山碑，重点是“形”。
（手写笔记字太丑啦，捂脸(/∇＼*)）","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221127/2022112706494127039607.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221127/2022112706494174065371.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221127/2022112706494092382630.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":5,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第98天
◎暴露出一个问题，线条不流畅，不凝实自然。存在画字行为-_-||感谢老师提醒！
◎再次过了一下视频，发现我忽略了“意在笔先”这个关键点。先记住原贴字形，在脑子里过一下，看准再动笔。写不顺畅的字多写几遍。
◎关于笔势，个人理解是基于对字的理解，笔豪顺势而动，写出来的字具有书写性，字整体流畅，笔画凝实。字形我还没有掌握完全，对于笔势，多写写，顺其自然，暂不刻意追求。打算先过一遍绎山碑再调整。","hasMore":true}

{"images":[{"width":4000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221007/202210071020343687665.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221007/2022100710203325410218.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221007/20221007102033686941.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第64天\n本来打算写下8个字，但是看了昨天的字，质量不好，还是得再提炼一下质量，求稳不求快。\n最近试了好多纸张，每一家的纸纸性都不太一样，多数会洇墨，今天试了用吹风机吹一下纸，要好点。","hasMore":false}

夫道者
有清有浊 有动有静

动者 静之基
人能常清静
天地悉皆归

{"images":[{"width":4000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220926/2022092610095517945890.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4000,"height":2250,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220926/2022092610095599637881.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第57天\n😭这个练习环境有亿点点糟糕，隔壁打到关键时刻，会疯狂的敲技能，然后桌子不可避免的抖动。我太难了(´._.｀)","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4000,"height":2250,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220925/2022092511444171285494.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第56天\n今天进入不了状态，写不顺，写了一整张三开的纸，只有一个写的勉强完整。可能是太晚了，11点才开始写。\n老师昨天说笔画不要硬是写细，今天我试了一下放开写，粗了我感觉写不顺。决定不管粗细了，就按照这个字的粗细练一段时间试试。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2250,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220924/2022092406112040315803.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第55天\n无他，但手熟尔。\n写着很困难的圈圈，经过对显字的精临，现在要容易一点了。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220924/2022092412044572752025.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220924/2022092412044604765838.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第54天\n精临精临，提炼单笔与整字质量。感觉有点进步，因为有了一个新的镇纸₍ᐢ⸝⸝›  ̫ ‹⸝⸝ᐢ₎","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220922/2022092209593529310483.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第53天\n弯曲弧多，要慢慢写，一笔一笔的仔细写，才能把握住线条的粗细和质量，特别是要调锋，写快了笔画直接散架。\n现在蘸一次墨比之前写的久了。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220921/2022092110085347698549.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220921/2022092110085241956861.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第52天\n曲线一定要很小心，写不到位就多写，练成肌肉记忆😂字整体感觉不太顺畅自然，慢慢练吧，非一日之功。写字很舒服。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220920/2022092010174932919870.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220920/2022092010174975366720.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第51天\n发现笔画粗细不一致，线条质量不行，这样看起来线条不流畅，生硬，明天开始一定注意这个问题。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220919/2022091910092849193321.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220919/2022091910092784378221.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第50天\n天地缓缓，静夜无声，写完一张，恍然如梦，已过2小时。一张16个字写了2小时，感叹一下时间咻的就过去了。\n","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220918/2022091806435879015705.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220918/2022091806435821012295.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220918/2022091806435859547158.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第49天\n篆书之书体，因形立意，体正势圆，左不见撇，右不见捺，风韵优美。——抄至大秦赋。这也是篆书的特点。秦篆“帝”字，让我满脑子都是秦王。有兴趣的同学可以去看看大秦帝国，打发时间同时感受一下那个时代的气氛。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220917/2022091704243191420493.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3106,"height":4096,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220917/2022091704243197542602.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3106,"height":4096,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220917/20220917042432224608.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第48天\n纯净料毛边纸写复杂的字，好累！！！写一个歇10分钟！决定明天投向蝉翼纸的怀抱！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220916/2022091609494215883081.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220916/2022091609494264217007.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220916/2022091609494141764872.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第47天\n今天是曲线练习，身体不适，越写越集中不了精力 。但很明显，曲线问题很大，弯曲的各有特点，就是不统一，这个字还需要练习。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220915/2022091506284594440391.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220915/2022091506283615019128.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220915/2022091506283500967126.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第46天
明天复工，白天练不成了，哦豁。
今天写的急，笔画质量不行，没有认真临帖找结构问题。
一个字2分钟，横竖加两张字，花了1个半小时，还没画框框，每个字还比较急。之后正常复工了，时间上会有很大的问题。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220914/2022091403541690096894.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220914/2022091403541709555817.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220914/2022091403541683761513.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第45天\n听风雨，安静练习。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220913/2022091311314445490672.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220913/2022091311314481183388.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220913/2022091311314489142953.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第44天\n八个字，看着好简单，写起来是真费劲。“立”和“不”的曲线，“（”这一笔不好写。基础线条练习很重要。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220912/2022091204260326179842.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220912/202209120426032637424.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220912/2022091204260317579237.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第43天\n①笔画圆润，带入横竖曲框练习时的感觉，每一笔都认真对待。②用纯净料毛边纸还控制的不太好，比如“立”接笔处容易洇墨，需要小心一点。但舍不得换纸，这个纸挺好的，容易浸入墨，能很好的表达笔的意思，适合练习。蝉翼纸对于我来说这方面差点，练好了再用蝉翼纸。③多看，多写，多体会。疫情在家，太适合练习了，正常上下班之后就很少能有这样的机会了。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220911/2022091108383104188789.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220911/2022091108383056284157.jpg","idx":1},{"width":4000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220911/2022091108383111462236.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第42天\n加入新的练习，属于激情开整","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220910/2022091007022508554881.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220910/2022091007022438486554.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220910/20220910070225658771.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第41天 中秋快乐！\n快到饭点了，饿了，写急了点，质量肉眼可见的下降。一定要慢慢写，行笔慢进度快。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220909/2022090910122803720910.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220909/2022090910122619811446.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第40天\n今天到了薄蝉翼纸，裁了一张试试，结论是：我这水平驾驭不了这纸，以后再试。不过已经裁了一张了，将就写完。\n昨晚没睡好，今天白天没补觉，导致精神恍惚，脑瓜子还有点疼有点迷糊，潦草拼了个作业，晚安。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220908/2022090806445107025609.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220908/2022090806445155393351.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220908/2022090806445173393303.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第39天\n·行笔缓缓，徐徐铺进。简单的横竖曲框，写好了也很开心。\n·写完一张，感觉问题不大，把纸拎起来竖着看，就感觉有些地方很不协调😂","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":854,"height":640,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220907/2022090708314410321210.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":854,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220907/2022090708314415796632.jpg","idx":1},{"width":640,"height":854,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220907/2022090708314414858406.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第38天\n接下来攻克弧线和框框，感觉可以同步进行，交叉练习","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220906/2022090603490984918783.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220906/2022090603491018874629.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220906/2022090603490915296461.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第37天\n·练习过程比较放松，感觉到有提升会身心愉悦。\n·老师提示的竖线要以刚练习横线的态度去练习，很有道理。竖线跟横线难度不是一个等级的，横线练习到位了再练竖线，竖线会容易找到感觉。竖线练习对于整体控笔和体悟，都有很大的帮助。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220905/2022090506421141215059.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220905/2022090506421261523808.jpg","idx":1},{"width":4000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220905/2022090506421183339183.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第36天\n依然是主练竖线，慢慢积累手感，所幸有一两条竖线满意，之后的练习就找这一两条完美线条的感觉 。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220904/202209040349377884714.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220904/2022090403493820626523.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220904/2022090403493756927254.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第35天\n小猫咪，你跑不脱！不是喜欢踩纸嘛，等我带个印泥回家，让你踩！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220903/2022090308341382026346.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220903/2022090308341375049092.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第34天\n虽然感觉没什么进步，但是翻了一下之前的作业，发现还是有提升的。坚持每一天的练习，细微进步很难感觉到，隔一段时间收获惊喜。所以目前练习的不好，不要急躁，徐徐图之。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220902/2022090211544832223546.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220902/2022090211544880916285.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220902/2022090211544896128063.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第33天\n横竖弧框的练习。弧线“（”起笔和粗细控制不好。\n做核酸排队站罚站了2小时，练习的时候腿有点酸。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220902/2022090212135968559872.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第32天\n今天事情比较多，练习非常潦草","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220831/2022083110281691328302.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220831/2022083110281762192877.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220831/2022083110281702242792.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第31天\n横竖弧框日常练习。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220830/2022083008595526918581.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220830/2022083008595392998485.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220830/2022083008595499758451.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第30天\n横竖弧框日常练习","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220829/2022082911591998753549.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220829/2022082911591979235395.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第29天\n线条练习。缓缓行笔，多感受。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220828/2022082810153592785935.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220828/2022082810153738094793.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第28天\n找不到感觉，最近几天一点都没有进步，甚至比前几天还糟糕。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220828/2022082811233264544951.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220828/2022082811233254679275.jpg","idx":1},{"width":4000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220828/2022082811233319883200.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第27天\n心欲静，更难放。静不下来","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220826/2022082610342553665437.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220826/2022082610342535850207.jpg","idx":1},{"width":4000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220826/2022082610342578660275.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第26天\n认真划拉好每一根线条，写完一张就累得不行。每日练习在精不在量。（绝对不是偷懒😂）\n每天开始的时候，总要一轮的时间上手，要第二轮才能进入状态，还需要坚持练习才行。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220825/2022082511482095976252.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220825/2022082511482195747022.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第25天\n这两天有点忙，挤时间练习。之前常用的一种纸用完了，新买的纸没之前的纸好用，适应中。\n突然找到了竖线条的感觉，保持！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220825/2022082512241720493405.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220825/20220825122416072245.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第24天\n不在状态，练习再多也没用，今天很潦草。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220823/2022082310542796650288.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220823/2022082310542815562991.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第23天\n滴，浪里小黑条前来打卡","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220822/2022082210170060584277.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220822/2022082210170044799035.jpg","idx":1},{"width":4000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220822/2022082210170089356838.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第22天\n竖线加量，还是没有体现出质感，加油加油！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220821/202208210514538284624.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220821/2022082105145389561505.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220821/2022082105145386131780.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":5,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第21天\n竖线一定要以横线刚开始的心态去练习，是一个新的开端，控笔的感觉会有所提升。突然感觉到线条的质感了，线条有力，纤微向背毫发死生。有所体会，但手下的墨迹才开始成型。\n多加练习，会有收获。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220820/2022082004174874872631.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220820/2022082004175000219367.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220820/2022082004175041546838.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第20天\n横竖线练习。竖线还需要坚持练习。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220819/2022081909051369668584.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220819/2022081909051381023135.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220819/2022081909051433846098.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":6,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第19天\n今天主要练习横线，竖线弧线浅摸一下。\n最后墨碟没墨了，没有把框框画完。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220818/2022081808124067180658.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220818/2022081808124222494579.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220818/2022081808124244641177.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第18天\n稳住稳住稳住～～~~~~~！依然是浪里小黑条。\n线条划拉到一半没墨了，不要强行继续，及时蘸墨，不然线条会变得毛躁无力。这又出现一个问题，两笔衔接过渡不自然。弧线不着急，争取横竖线早日过关。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220817/2022081710474403783534.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220817/202208171047442409980.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220817/2022081710474487288744.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":6,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第17天\n线条浪的飞起。O_o","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220816/2022081611443629444527.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220816/2022081611443509292349.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第17天\n才加完班，并且身体不适。今天完全没有动墨水儿，这是昨天打完卡后写的竖和弧线，弧线后面砚台里没墨了，懒得加，就草草了事。\n","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3072,"height":3995,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220815/2022081510110360353867.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220815/202208151011036974642.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220815/2022081510110398868463.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第16天
蝉翼纸很好玩，下次别玩了，看不见浪成什么样了。
加厚毛边纸和普通毛边纸暂时感觉差不多。
横竖弧继续加油练习鸭！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3072,"height":4096,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220814/2022081410300244051274.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3969,"height":3969,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220814/2022081410323815431724.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2048,"height":4096,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220814/2022081410300200367233.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第15天\n浅浅摸了一下框框，体会一下横竖弧的综合体，虽然丑了亿点。。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220814/2022081401253074276625.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220814/2022081401253130482797.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220814/2022081401253122653106.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第14天\n试了一下新到的墨汁，很糟糕。阻笔，洇墨。墨汁在下笔的时候跑光啦，后继无墨还洇纸！写得很烦躁。勉强把倒出来的墨汁写完。还是老师推荐的汉墨轻胶好用。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220812/2022081211403757951513.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220812/2022081211420829157781.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220812/2022081211403784264186.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第13天\n横竖弧练习。今天太晚了，有点困，写着写着打个突，手一抖，哦豁。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220811/2022081109580665426012.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220811/2022081109580666572243.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220811/2022081109580682517903.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第12天\n横竖线及弧线练习。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220810/2022081011120398454986.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220810/2022081011125350940306.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220810/2022081011120405017231.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":5,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第11天\n横竖线练习，心态不对。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220809/2022080909421836617298.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第10天\n今天好热，手膀子也酸唧唧的，运笔不灵活。也不想动，今天的作业简便一点。\n另外，最开始写了几张，怎么写都不对，然后发现是绞笔了，应该是润笔的时候弄乱了，重新洗了笔再写就好了。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220808/2022080809243016579577.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220808/2022080809243056121045.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220808/2022080809243060731007.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第9天\n今天加入了弧线练习，挺有意思的。今天裁了两张4尺的纸，过程令人放松和愉悦O(∩_∩)O","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220807/2022080708025437773895.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220807/202208070802542175253.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220807/2022080708025461727629.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第7天 及 第8天\n竖线没找到感觉","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220806/2022080612050520286734.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220806/2022080612050512820383.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第6天
今天加入竖向线条练习。
起笔大概率洇纸。
波浪线变直还需要时间。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220805/2022080512045321559419.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220805/202208051204523393592.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第5天\n8月4日的。昨日复昨日⁼̴̤̆ ꇴ ⁼̴̤̆","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220804/2022080412160760639969.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220804/2022080412160817147939.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第4天
这是8月3日打卡。今天换了只笔，笔锋的粗细、蘸墨都得再熟悉一下。
划线时听歌，脑子里天马行空，没有刻意去想线条怎么拉，轻松一点，练练火候。

练字无关：今天练字放的歌曲之一——“六合尽扫待时日，纵横捭阖西风狂。”《崛起》","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":6000,"height":8000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220802/2022080210383088369013.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220802/2022080210402177325621.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":854,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220802/2022080210404131148990.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第3天\n分心的厉害，边看直播边写。激动的心，颤抖的手。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":854,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220801/2022080109030881775841.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":854,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220801/2022080109030881413388.jpg","idx":1},{"width":640,"height":854,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220801/2022080109030895671371.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第2天
喵：会不会写？不会我帮你！

练字听歌循环：自春生，入秋藏，天之道四时更迭有常。歌名《江山雪》，李蚊香唱的。
平常心练字，不急不躁，一定有收获。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":6000,"height":8000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20220731/2022073105450883394903.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第1天
今天工具到齐，终于开始学习了，问题挺多的。
1.不稳，平行线不平，线条间隔不均匀，一条线的后端容易斜。
2.续笔的时候，与上一笔结合的很奇怪。
3.站着写有点累。
